name: ReMoDDeD
savepath: This is one of our largest updates in quite some time, which introduces one of our long-awaited features; Demon Tempering. This new system will greatly expand just how unique your unique items really are, and introduce a vast set of new itemization controls. We hope everyone enjoys this large feature addition as well as the the other Improvements, QoL Additions and Bug Fixes we always try to sprinkle in!

Demon Tempering is a new system that allows you to combine body parts found from special monsters with special unique items to create a brand new item, with it's own special characteristics. This is an entirely new item quality; Tempered. Please both enjoy this dynamic system as well as be patient with it's future iterations. More info on this new addition can be found on our Discord and in your recipe menu.
